name: Crystal Crisis (itch)
description:
FLASHING COLORS WARNING

NOTE-Unity Audio Mixer doesn't work properly in browser, download for enhanced audio.

-Controls-

WASD/Arrow Keys To Move

-Credits-

Main music from:https://www.bensound.com/

Boss music:https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1113863

-Gameplay-

If you hit the spikes, you turn into glitch mode where you cannot interact with boxes or spikes until you hit a checkpoint.

Glitched blocks-only the glitched of you can walk on them.

Red Spikes-Kill all versions of you
